headline: Peppermint Pie
description: Our peppermint pie recipe marries the season's most festive holiday flavors: chocolate and peppermint. With little effort and prep time, it's an easy yet spirited dessert everyone will enjoy.
name: Peppermint Pie
recipeIngredient: 30 chocolate wafer cookies (such as Nabisco Famous) (from 1 [9-ounce] package)
8 ounces cream cheese, at room temperature
Crushed hard peppermint candies (such as Starlight Peppermint Mints) (from 8 round candies)

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the Crust: Preheat oven to 350Â°F. Place chocolate wafers in a food processor; process until finely ground, about 30 seconds. Add butter, sugar, and salt; pulse until mixture has a wet sand consistency, about 5 (1-second) pulses. Press mixture firmly and evenly into bottom and up sides of a 9-inch tart pan. Place tart pan on a rimmed baking sheet. Bake in preheated oven until crust is firm and appears dry, about 10 minutes. Remove from oven; let cool completely, about 15 minutes.

Prepare the Filling: Beat cream cheese and marshmallow creme in a large bowl with an electric mixer on medium speed until smooth, about 1 minute, 30 seconds. Add peppermint extract; beat on low speed until fully incorporated, about 15 seconds. Set aside. Beat whipping cream, sugar, and food coloring in a separate large bowl with an electric mixer on medium-high speed until stiff peaks form, about 1 minute, 30 seconds. Gently fold whipped cream mixture into cream cheese mixture until just combined.
Assemble Pie: Spread filling into prepared crust. Freeze until filling firms up, about 2 hours. Decorate with crushed peppermint candies. Serve.

mainEntity.name: Should peppermint pie be served frozen or thawed?

acceptedAnswer.text: This peppermint pie should be served straight from the freezer for a firm but creamy consistency.

mainEntity.name: Can I make a gluten-free peppermint pie?

acceptedAnswer.text: For a gluten-free version, substitute the chocolate wafers with a gluten-free cookie variety. Then proceed with the recipe as written.

mainEntity.name: Can I use a store-bought pie crust for peppermint pie?

acceptedAnswer.text: Feel free to prepare this pie with a store-bought crust for a shortcut option.
